com.sensoro.beacon.kit

类 SensoroBeaconManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sensoro.beacon.kit.SensoroBeaconManager

  • public class SensoroBeaconManager
extends java.lang.Object
    beacon管理类
    beacon manager

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static interface  SensoroBeaconManager.BeaconManagerListener
      beacon服务回调接口

      设置beacon有效时间 超过该时间没有扫描到beacon,则认为beacon消失

      • setUpdateBeaconPeriod

        public void setUpdateBeaconPeriod(long period)
        设置beacon列表回调频率
        set the callback frequency of beacon list
        参数:
        period - 默认 1 秒(单位：毫秒)
        default value is 1 s(unit:ms)

      • setForegroundScanPeriod

        public void setForegroundScanPeriod(long period)
        设置 SDK 前台扫描周期
        set sdk scan between period in foreground
        参数:
        period - 默认 1.1 秒(单位：毫秒)
        default value is 1.1 s(unit:ms)

      • setForegroundBetweenScanPeriod

        public void setForegroundBetweenScanPeriod(long period)
        设置 SDK 前台扫描间隔
        set sdk scan period in foreground
        参数:
        period - 默认 0 秒(单位：毫秒)
        default value is 0 s(unit:ms)

      • setBackgroundScanPeriod

        public void setBackgroundScanPeriod(long period)
        设置 SDK 后台扫描周期
        set sdk scan between period in background
        参数:
        period - 默认 10 秒(单位：毫秒)
        default value is 10 s(unit:ms)

      • setBackgroundBetweenScanPeriod

        public void setBackgroundBetweenScanPeriod(long period)
        设置 SDK 后台扫描间隔
        set sdk scan period in background
        参数:
        period - 默认 5 分钟(单位：毫秒)
        default value is 5 min(unit:ms)

      • setBeaconExistTime

        public void setBeaconExistTime(long existTime)

        设置beacon有效时间

        超过该时间没有扫描到beacon,则认为beacon消失

        set the exist time of beacon

        if does not scan one beacon in exist time,than callback onGoneBeacon of this beacon
        参数:
        existTime - 默认 8 秒(单位：毫秒)
        default value is 8 s(unit:ms)
